I am 5'7, 140lbs, the medium fits well. Normally I don't like man-made fabrics, but I really like the material of this top. It's kind of like a drapey tencel fabric (but the fit is body-con, not loose). Because it is a thin fabric, it's easy to layer a chunky winter cardigan over it. The colors are really vibrant, I bought the light pink, dark teal, and the purple. All lovely.
The material is fabulous. The cut beautiful the color just delicious and the fit absolutely perfect. Oh and the price – – ridiculously low. What a gift this was.!
Nice quality, soft, and breathable. Has stood up to a couple of washes with no pilling. Stretchy but not transparent. Pretty thin by design, will not smooth bra lines etc.

Nice layering tops for skinny women. I’m 5’”8” with love handles. Was hoping to get enough hike out of them in an Xl to use for layering. I usually wear a medium/large. Still too small. I’m 148lbs with tummy issues. Beware if you don’t have a flat stomach don’t buy them.
Can dress this long sleeve up with anything or dress it down with anything. Ready to repurchase just to replace cause o have worn it out. True to size.

评论概述: "Cozy and Chic: A Review of the Long Sleeve T-Shirt"
评论详情: I recently purchased this long sleeve t-shirt and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The quality of the material is fantastic - it's soft, comfortable, and feels very durable. The fit is just right, not too tight but not too loose either. I also love the design, it's simple yet stylish. The sleeves are the perfect length, not too short or too long. Overall, I highly recommend this long sleeve t-shirt for anyone looking for a versatile and well-made piece for their wardrobe.
Size medium. Loved the length. Wasn’t too short like the majority of shirts these days…
Comfortable and the fit is perfect! I ordered 5 colors!!
Super cute, stretchy. Tight fitting, but very flattering. What you see in the picture is exactly what you get.

I purchased the black size small shirt (5'7"/111 lbs) for casual daily wear.  I usually would select extra small but that was not an option; the small did fit perfectly and looked great the first time worn. At first I liked the shirt so much I ordered a second shirt a few weeks later. As the new shirt arrived, I happened to notice that the first shirt has started to fade.  After laundering the second shirt once I put the two together to see how much it had faded.  See picture.  Not only had both shirts faded with each wash, but after approximately 4 washings the neckline on the first shirt has started to loose its form. Note that I always wash my darks with Woolite Dark detergent on gentle wash cycle and low heat in the dryer.  I was very surprised so I then double checked the tag instructions which read: "washing at low".  Not certain what THAT means but would not have bought this item had I known it was only good for 6-7 wears.

I bought the pink one as part of a Halloween costume (I was a "sexy" axolotyl!) the fit was so nice and so flattering that I bought it in 5 more colors. I'm wearing the blue one right now. Surprised and very pleased!

I have bought this shirt in 5 colors now, and I absolutely love it. Such a great basic. The stretchy ribbed material is extremely flattering and the neckline is just perfect. Recommend to all my friends!
Stunning colors and the fit like a dream! So soft and comfortable. Will be buying more!
Love it! Super cute and quick shipping!
My Granddaughter was asking for this and it looks like it will fit her perfectly. The material is very soft and will work very nice.
This is my favorite fitting grey shirt. Makes me feel sexy without bulging out in all the wrong places. I got it in black too. I wear these more than any other shirts I have. No pilling.
I bought a black, purple and white top. I love them all. However, the white will need an undershirt as it's thinner material. Totally would buy more.

评论概述: Incredibly soft, definitely a closet staple
评论详情: Was looking for a nice scoop neck long sleeve and this is exactly that! I love the material, it's super soft and stretchy -- it's a very flattering top. I like it a lot more than other long sleeves I've gotten from other brands/stores and will definitely be buying more.

评论概述: very comfortable, I ordered a bunch more of them
评论详情: First of material: 92% Rayon, 8% spandex (in case somebody is very set on cotton, I usually am). I have sensitive skin to any ithchy material and this was great. Amazon recommended size Medium for me and that probably would work. But I wanted a little more length in sleeves and at the bottom. I ordered Large. It fits exactly like on the picture and very comfortable. The color seem a little bit darker than on the picture BUT it is still vibrant and i like it very much. Ordered more in different colors, might order extra blue one, because the color is very classy.
Soft and fits well just came with a whole already

My sister and I used to be obsessed with with the Express long sleeved shirts that came in all different styles. (Swoop neck, v-neck, crew neck) They stopped making them forever ago and I’ve yet to find anything as close to comfortable as they were. This is definitely close and I need every single color.
I have these in multiple colors and they are so flattering.

I have a handful of colors in short sleeve.  These  fit to form.  The material is lighter than short sleeve ones but still happy. The form stays with no stretching.  They wash well on delicate and cold and I hang dry.  I wear several times before washing.  The colors are nice and have not added.  Great value for the cost.  Material is soft and breathable.
The shirt looks nothing like the picture. It’s still cute and I’ll probably still wear it but it’s not ribbed and it’s more of a spandex material. Not at all like what I was expecting
Love the fit and the fact that it’s ribbed

will definitely be buying more colors! super flattering fit, i like that it’s longer so you can tuck it into jeans, or bunch it up/fold it in to make it cropped. perfect long sleeve and obsessed with this blue color. i usually wear M/L and I got a L and it’s perfect
so good & flattering!

This long sleeve is comfortable, lightweight, a full shirt (in a world of crop tops when a girl just wants a full length shirt), and I’ll be buying it in another color at least but maybe not white because it might be see-through. I got one size up just to make sure it didn’t hug too tightly on my tummy and it’s very flattering on me with the size-up. Usually a medium, I got a large and love it.
I love these shirt so much that I bought them in multiple colors. Very comfortable & fit is great. True to size.

I love these shirts and have bought them in quite a few colors and styles. The material is not too thin or thick and the ribbing gives it stretch to fit many different shapes and sizes. I recently lost 20 lbs and the shirts still fit nicely and definitely don’t look stretched out or worn at all. They hold up well in the washer and dryer and haven’t lost shape. Seams are still intact and color hasn’t faded. Will definitely be ordering more.
